item.title: Alyosha Efros: The Revolution Will Not Be Supervised
item.description: Title: The Revolution Will Not Be Supervised Speaker: Alyosha Efros, University of California Berkeley Date and Time: 2019 Place: Room 304, Teknikringen 14 Abstract: Computer vision has made impressive gains through the use of deep learning models trained with large-scale labeled data. However, labels require expertise and curation and are expensive to collect. Worse, semantic supervision often leads to models that can “cheat”. Can one discover useful visual representations without the use of explicitly curated labels?
